  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    • 
      

    

  


  

    Sources (authoritative):
    
    
      
  • Home — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/
    • 

  • Lifestyle Everyday — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/lifestyle-everyday
    • 

  • Miscellaneous — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/subcategories/miscellaneous
    • 

  • Tip Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/tip
    • 

  • Savings Goal Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/savings
    • 
    

  


  

    Changelog

    

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

    Changelog

    

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = 




  Audit: Complete

  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
      
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$

  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)

20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60

\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $

Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    • 
      

    

  


  

    Sources (authoritative):
    
    
      
  • Home — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/
    • 

  • Lifestyle Everyday — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/lifestyle-everyday
    • 

  • Miscellaneous — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/subcategories/miscellaneous
    • 

  • Tip Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/tip
    • 

  • Savings Goal Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/savings

    Changelog

    

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $

  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)

\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}

\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units

\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)

\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}

\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$

  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)

1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$

Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3.   • Lifestyle Everyday — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/lifestyle-everyday

    Changelog

    

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

    Changelog

    

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    • 
      

    

  


  

    Sources (authoritative):

    Profile ·

20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = 




  Audit: Complete

  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
      
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = 




  Audit: Complete

  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
      
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
      
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    • 
      

    

  


  

    Sources (authoritative):

    • 

  • Tip Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/tip
    • 

  • Savings Goal Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/savings

    Changelog

    

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

    LinkedIn

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)

    https://calcdomain.com/lifestyle-everyday
    • 

  • Miscellaneous — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/subcategories/miscellaneous
    • 

  • Tip Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/tip
    • 

  • Savings Goal Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/savings
    • 
    

  


  

    Changelog

    

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    • 
      

    

  


  

    Sources (authoritative):
    
    
      
  • Home — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/

  • Lifestyle Everyday — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/lifestyle-everyday
    • 

  • Miscellaneous — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/subcategories/miscellaneous
    • 

  • Tip Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/tip
    • 

  • Savings Goal Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/savings

    Changelog

    

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

    Changelog

    

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)

\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.

\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)

\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)

Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}

\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    • 
      

    

  


  

    Sources (authoritative):

    https://calcdomain.com/lifestyle-everyday
    •

    https://calcdomain.com/subcategories/miscellaneous
    • 

  • Tip Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/tip

  • Savings Goal Calculator — calcdomain.com · Accessed 2026-01-19
    https://calcdomain.com/savings

      Version: 0.1.0-draft

      Last code update: 2026-01-19
    

    

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = 




  

    Formula (LaTeX) + variables + units
    

      This section shows the exact formulas used by the calculator engine, plus variable definitions and units.
    

    

      

  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}\]

  
\text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)\]

  
\text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right)





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}\]

  
\text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}\]

  
\text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}}





  
Formula (extracted LaTeX)

  
\[\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60\]

  
\text{Tax Amount} = $120.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $$ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $$ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $$ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $$ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $$ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $$ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $$ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $$ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $$



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

  0.1.0-draft · 2026-01-19
  
    
    
  • Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
    • 

  • Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
    • 

  • Confirm sources are authoritative and relevant to the calculator methodology.
    • 
  



  


  

    Verified by Ugo Candido on 2026-01-19

    Profile ·
    LinkedIn
  



20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
    •

20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
\[\]

  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $



      
Variables and units

      
    
        
  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)

20.00 \times \left( \frac{8}{100} \right) = $9.60





  
Formula (extracted text)

  
  
1. Calculate Tax Amount: If tax is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tax Amount} = \text{Subtotal} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tax \%}}{100} \right) $ 2. Determine Tip Base: The base for the tip calculation depends on your selection: $ \text{Tip Base} = \begin{cases} \text{Subtotal} & \text{if tipping on subtotal} \\ \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} & \text{if tipping on subtotal + tax} \end{cases} $ 3. Calculate Tip Amount: If tip is entered as a percentage (%): $ \text{Tip Amount} = \text{Tip Base} \times \left( \frac{\text{Tip \%}}{100} \right) $ 4. Calculate Grand Total: $ \text{Grand Total} = \text{Subtotal} + \text{Tax Amount} + \text{Tip Amount} $ 5. Calculate Amount Per Person: $ \text{Amount Per Person} = \frac{\text{Grand Total}}{\text{Number of People}} $

  • T = property tax (annual or monthly depending on input) (currency)
